body_html: It will depend on the number of groups and how big the individual groups are, larger group sizes(>16?) should have no problem running as parallel normal convolutions. But smaller group sizes (<8) (apple uses 4 on mobile) would benefit greatly from a more optimized implementation. (even thought they will always suffer from poor arithmetic intensity (ratio of compute to memory operations)
